column4: i dloaded a fre mmorpg game called planeshift and it is a .bin file, how can i install it?
you might have to chmod +x file.bin first you also might need sudo for chomod

zazeem@zazilla:~$ chmod +x /home/zazeem/Desktop/PlaneShift_CBV0.3.015b.bin zazeem@zazilla:~$ sudo sh /home/zazeem/Desktop/PlaneShift_CBV0.3.015b.bin  /home/zazeem/Desktop/PlaneShift_CBV0.3.015b.bin: /home/zazeem/Desktop/PlaneShift_CBV0.3.015b.bin: cannot execute binary file
when i type sudo sh nameoffile.bin it says cannot execute a binary file :/
